heading: Our Process
intro: We've refined our approach to deliver maximum value in minimum time.

steps.title: Discover
steps.description: We learn about your business, goals, and audience through a focused consultation.

steps.title: Design & Build
steps.description: We design a clear system and build the deliverables with usability and performance in mind.

steps.title: Review & Refine
steps.description: We iterate with structured feedback windows to polish details and align on results.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: We ship, measure, and provide support so your team can operate confidently.
